channel.title: Events | Clara Saito - Performance and Visual Artist

item.title: The Anarchic Spiderman
item.description:
7 days of confused superheroes and experimental anarchism.

This festival was created as an extension of the Title is a Drawing (…) with works curated in link with the practice of anarchism developed by the artist.

Concept and curation: Clara Saito With works by: Anonymous museum for unsigned works, Jessica, Alexander Nieuwenhuis, Petros Panagiotis Orfanos, Noha Ramadan, S.M. Snider, Cleide Saito and Clara Saito
